name: The Inbetween (Unicae Games, Lucas Ballard, Trashikan)
name_original: The Inbetween (Unicae Games, Lucas Ballard, Trashikan)
description:
What if everything we see in our world is only the surface of a deep, dark pond? And what if you found a way to wade and see into this darkness? What would await you on the other side?

Your case

You are playing as Steven Cane, a private investigator who is hired to find out what happened at the Rosewood Mansion. You don't know who your client is but they paid well. Exploring the mansion you find a strange music box with a tiny key crank. You wind it up and a strange melody plays...

Game Features

Explore an old, long-abandoned mansion, riddled with clues and strange irregularities. Can you find out what happened to the Rosewood family?

A game by Dennis Dressler, Lucas Ballard & Trashikan
